noun.description: An acrobatic movement in which a person turns head over heels in the air or on the ground and lands or finishes on their feet.

verb.description: Perform a somersault, or make a similar movement accidentally.
examples: his car somersaulted into a ditch

origin: Mid 16th century (as a noun): from Old French sombresault, from Provençal sobresaut, from sobre above + saut leap.
